title: The Best Champions to ban in low elo (regardless of what the meta is)

replies.body: 100% spot on list for low elo in the current meta/patch! I would of put them in different order and left out Malphite and added Malzahar

didnt mean this list to be ordered just a suggestion of the best bans for lower elos.
Malphite is in there mainly because low elo people are afraid of this pick.
To be honest Malzahar is ban worthy in any elo because of how "anti-fun" it is playing against (mainly because people dont like to farm under tower for 20 minutes straight.
Doesn't Bronze always ban. Amumu, Malphite & Blitz?
Shouldn't we add Vi to the list? She seems to get tons of damage out of nowhere...I noticed that I just seemed to have way more damage than anyone else when I play Vi

Most of the champions i listed are 1v9 carry champions, vi is not a 1v9 carry champ she is strong in early but falls off in late game.
which makes her a non factor on this.

Well, definitely Yasuo at the mo as I'm pretty sure he's bugged lol

Xin is a number 1 priority ban for me. He's so easy to play and lashes out heaps of damage in 1v1 scenarios.

He's definitely scary in my low elo games.

The thing is no one should be 1v1'ing a xin zhao, unless you can kite better than kallista you won't beat him, the weakness to xin is grouping so he can't make 1v1 picks.
The thing is if xin gets behind hes pretty useless.

But we're talking about Bronze elo.

Where it's who comes out in a 1v1 wins the whole game, because people don't know how to play as a team.
I have 2 priority bans. One being Vayne cause i play mainly tanks and the other is {{champion:238}} because of who i play with plays as fiddlesticks and he is really annoying anyway
